//State register
reg[1:0]state_reg;

//Alwaysblockforasynchronousreset
always@(posedgeclk)begin
if(areset)begin
state_reg<=2'b01;
endelsebegin
case(state_reg)
2'b00:begin
if(train_valid)begin
state_reg<=2'b01;
end
end
2'b01:begin
if(train_taken&&state_reg<3)begin
state_reg<=state_reg+2'b01;
endelseif(!train_taken&&state_reg>0)begin
state_reg<=state_reg-2'b01;
end
end
2'b10:begin
if(train_taken&&state_reg<3)begin
state_reg<=state_reg+2'b01;
endelseif(!train_taken&&state_reg>0)begin
state_reg<=state_reg-2'b01;
end
end
2'b11:begin
if(train_taken&&state_reg<3)begin
state_reg<=state_reg+2'b01;
endelseif(!train_taken&&state_reg>0)begin
state_reg<=state_reg-2'b01;
end
end
default:begin
state_reg<=2'b01;
end
endcase
end
end
endmodule

			2'b01:state=in?2'b01:2'b00;//ifBinlow,stayinB;otherwise,goA

		endcase
	end

always_comb	begin	//always_comb is a non-blocking assignment statement
	min=a;	//assigning the value of a to min
	if(b<min)begin	//comparing min with b
		min=b;	//if b is less than min, update min to b
	end
	if(c<min)begin	//comparing min with c
		min=c;	//if c is less than min, update min to c
	end
	if(d<min)begin	//comparing min with d
		min=d;	//if d is less than min, update min to d
	end
end	//always_comb block ends here

endmodule

					endelsebegin
						state<=1'b0;	//NextstateisAotherwise

				1'b1:begin

					end
				end
				default:begin
					state<=1'b0;	//DefaultstateisA
				end
			endcase
		end
	end
	
	assignout=(state==1'b1);	//OutputisthecurrentstateoftheFSM
